title: Bitcoin Price Prediction with Machine Learning
description: In this Data Science Project we will predict Bitcoin Price for the next 30 days with Machine Learning model Support Vector Machines(Regression).You can download the data set we need for this task from here:Let’s start with importing librariesRemove the date columnNow lets create a variable to predict ‘n’ days out there in the futureTo Show last 5 rows of new data set
